tool_description: Provide full range of currency exchange rate.
name: Currency Ex
title: Currency Ex

api_list.name: Currency List
api_list.description: List of available currency in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-ex.p.rapidapi.com/get_currency_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-ex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-ex.p.rapidapi.com/get_currency_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-ex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
